review: This is an amazing little bit of technology for the price. DirectTV had lost the ability to access YouTube, where a lot of the educational programming my kids loved resided. Getting Fire Stick gave me back access to the YouTube channel to which I had subscribed AND opened up access to some really fabulous programming through Amazon Prime (worth the money you should subscribe.) They love Creative Galaxy and I love that they are learning things that will underscore their ability to read, think and create.
author: Amazon Customer
